docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 公式测试 ¶ 行内公式 xyz xyz 独行公式 y=\Sigma_{i=0}^N x_i y=\Sigma_{i=0}^N x_i
